name: K.N.O.T.
description:
Play a mind-bending game of shifting realities in order to survive and get to the exit.

There are only two levels and this is more of a proof of concept than a complete game.

Q: When did you start making the game?
A: Before the jam started we only knew that we want to make a top down game. The rest was done during the jam.

Q: What assets did you use?
A: Synty, Odin, UCC, Behaviour designer, Dotween, SimpleMan. 

Q: Are you beginners?
A: No, my partner and I are professional game developers, but we did this just for fun.

Q: Do you really have no RNG in the game?
A: Yes, there may be an asset with RNG particles and the screen noise may use it, but aside from that there is no RNG in the game.
